Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Kyle Lowry?

Kyle Lowry is 39 years old.

Where was Kyle Lowry born?

Kyle Lowry was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

When was Kyle Lowry born?

Kyle Lowry was born on March 25, 1986.

How tall is Kyle Lowry?

Kyle Lowry is 6-0 (183 cm) tall.

How much does Kyle Lowry weigh?

Kyle Lowry weighs 196 lbs (88 kg).

Is Kyle Lowry in the Hall of Fame?

Kyle Lowry is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Kyle Lowry drafted?

Kyle Lowry was drafted by Memphis Grizzlies, 1st round (24th pick, 24th overall), 2006 NBA Draft.

What position does Kyle Lowry play?

Point Guard.

What is Kyle Lowry's net worth?

Kyle Lowry has made at least $278,341,277 playing professional basketball.

How much does Kyle Lowry make?

Kyle Lowry made $33,296,296 in 2020.

What does Kyle Lowry average?

Kyle Lowry averages 3.0 points, 0.0 rebounds, and 1.0 assists per game.

How many rings does Kyle Lowry have?

Kyle Lowry has won one championship.

What is Kyle Lowry's Instagram account?

Kyle Lowry is on Instagram at kyle_lowry7.

What schools did Kyle Lowry attend?

Kyle Lowry attended Northeast in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, Cardinal Dougherty in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and Villanova.

What are Kyle Lowry's nicknames?

Mr. Raptor, KLow, G.R.O.A.T., North Philly's Finest, KLOE, Bulldog are nicknames for Kyle Lowry.
